headline: Observability Knowledge Graph
description:
Hi HN community,

We are a team of passionate engineers trying to address many new challenges in the observability space. We have been in the industry for many years, and come to realize that knowledge graph has a lot of potential to help solve many of the pain points, like cross-domain correlation and interactive troubleshooting for a highly dynamic modern cloud application.

Read our story at https://www.asserts.ai/blog/observability-knowledge-graph/

Comments and suggestions are highly appreciated.
description_zh-Hans:
嗨，HN社区，

我们是一个充满激情的工程师团队，试图解决可观察性领域的许多新挑战。我们已经在这个行业工作了很多年，并认识到知识图谱在帮助解决许多痛点方面有很大的潜力，比如跨域关联和高度动态的现代云应用的交互式故障排除。

请阅读我们的故事：https://www.asserts.ai/blog/observability-knowledge-graph/

非常感谢您的意见和建议。
description_zh-Hant:
嗨，HN社區，

我們是一個充滿激情的工程師團隊，試圖解決可觀察性領域的許多新挑戰。我們已經在這個行業工作了很多年，並認識到知識圖譜在幫助解決許多痛點方面有很大的潛力，比如跨域關聯和高度動態的現代雲應用的交互式故障排除。

請閱讀我們的故事：https://www.asserts.ai/blog/observability-knowledge-graph/

非常感謝您的意見和建議。
